title: The SII-PNI score: A novel composite biomarker for personalized mortality risk prediction in peritoneal dialysis patients
description: Objective Accurate risk stratification is crucial for personalized management in peritoneal dialysis (PD). This study aimed to develop and validate a novel biomarker, the SII-PNI score, integrating systemic immunoinflammatory index (SII) and prognostic nutrit…
